resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Sign Up here.

Sobjiwala is the leading Online Grocery store in Bangladesh, Primarily operating in Sylhet.\nOur wide range of products include all the grocery and supermarket items a typical family would need on a daily basis including fruits and vegetables.\nWe are a people oriented company and we believe that even in this automated world we can still talk to our customers every time they place an order. We would give a call to each and every customer to ensure that they are thoroughly satisfied with our supply
